text:
Conversable | Austin, TX | Full-time | Onsite | http://www.conversable.com

We're a conversational UI platform company in Austin. Some people call them chatbots, we think that's a bit too simplistic. Conversations are hard and require more than what's currently out there. We have a lot of traction with a good clientset and are showing no sig ns of slowing down.

At the moment we're a team of a bit over 20 people, but growing like crazy. We're looking for all sorts of engineers, from front-end to ML and NLP. If you're interested reach out to us at jobs@conversable.com!
